name: Solar Sprout
description:
Created for QRMJam and for the G4C student challenge ( and also for school! c': )
It ended up winning the grand prize for the challenge!!!!

Solar Sprout is a game about building, repairing, and enhancing connections in a city through applying energy in various ways. You play as Johnnie, a nonbinary robot, solving local issues.

Let me know if you find any bugs and I'll try and fix them!
